items: Created a website for voting for presenters at a BBD presentation event
Out of the 4 bursar groups, our groupâ€™s project was chosen as the best

1.heading: 4-day BBD Bursar Week
items: Created a real-time scheduling web application connected to Outlook

2.heading: 4-day BBD Bursar Week
items:
Built software that calculated the shortest route a person can take when moving
between major cities, this was then displayed on a map via the Google Maps Platform and the Google Vision API was used along with a camera to track a ball that was
programmed to move to cones representing the cities in real life

I used the Arduino Platform to set up proximity sensors to detect when the ball is
close to the cone
